src:
Novi monitor AOC Q27T1 prinaša kombinacijo živahnega oblikovanja in prvovrstne tehnologije

07 Nov 2019, 11:00


Oblikovalsko usmerjeni uporabniki imajo končno priložnost, da na svoje delovne mize postavijo nov monitor AOC Q27T1, ki ga je zasnoval Studio F. A. Porsche.

27-palčni monitor se ponaša z IPS panelom ločljivosti QHD, tri-stransko zasnovo brez okvirja ter edinstvenim asimetričnim kovinskim stojalom, kar ga naredi za popolno kombinacijo živahnega oblikovanja in prvovrstne tehnologije, ki delo pretvori v užitek.  
Živahen dizajn, vizionarska asimetrija
Edinstven dizajn asimetričnega stojala modela AOC Q27T1 preseneča z načinom, kako logično sledi porazdelitvi sile znotraj monitorja, da popolnoma uravnoteži težo monitorja. Ta zasnova poudarja prefinjeno konstrukcijsko iznajdljivost, da drži monitor na mestu, zaradi česar nekoliko spominja na sodobno kiparstvo.
Tri-stranski brezkončni zaslon z zasnovo brez robu skriva okvir na levi in desni strani za panelom, s čimer ustvari vtis, kot da je resnično brez okvirja. Spodnji okvir je izboljšan s sijajnim odtenkom, medtem ko matirano ukrivljeno ozadje poudarja čisto zasnovo monitorja. Priključki monitorja Q27T1 so skriti pod pokrovom s samo majhno odprtino za odhodne kable, kar doda celoto k skupnemu elegantnemu izgledu. 
Ni vse le v izgledu
Monitor AOC Q27T1 se ponaša s 27-palčnim IPS panelom, ki nudi odlično barvno reprodukcijo in široke kote gledanja. Quad HD ločljivost (2560 x 1440 pik) v kombinaciji s premazom proti bleščanju zagotavlja odlične in ostre slike. Zaslon poleg tega ponuja široko barvno paleto, ki pokriva 90% NTSC in 107% sRGB barvnega prostora in prvovrstno svetlost 350 nitov. Opremljen je z dvema HDMI in enim DisplayPort priključkom, kar omogoča enostavno povezavo z najrazličnejšimi napravami.
Novi monitor AOC Q27T1 je na voljo od novembra 2019 dalje po priporočeni prodajni ceni 329 EUR.
Več informacij in tehnične specifikacije: 

https://eu.aoc.com/en/monitors/q27t1


https://www.pchand.si/kombinacija-zivahnega-oblikovanja-in-prvovrstne-tehnologije-monitor-aoc-q27t1




Povezave: Aoc, Pchand
text:
The new AOC Q27T1 monitor brings a combination of vibrant design and first-class technology

07 Nov 2019, 11:00


Design-oriented users have the final opportunity to put a new AOC Q27T1 monitor designed by Studio F. A. Porsche on their desks.

The 27-inch monitor boasts an IPS QHD resolution panel, a three-sided bezel-less design, and a unique asymmetrical metal stand, making it the perfect combination of vibrant design and first-class technology that turns work into pleasure.
Vibrant design, visionary asymmetry
The unique design of the asymmetrical stand of the AOC Q27T1 surprises with the way it logically tracks the force distribution inside the monitor to perfectly balance the weight of the monitor. This design emphasizes sophisticated design ingenuity to hold the monitor in place, making it somewhat reminiscent of contemporary sculpture.
The three-sided, endless, bezel-less screen hides the frame on the left and right behind the panel, giving the impression that it is truly frameless. The lower bezel is enhanced with a glossy hue, while the matte curved backdrop emphasizes the clean design of the monitor. The Q27T1's monitor connectors are hidden under the hood with only a small opening for outgoing cables, which adds a whole lot to the overall chic look.
It's not just the appearance
The AOC Q27T1 monitor boasts a 27-inch IPS panel that offers excellent color reproduction and wide viewing angles. Quad HD resolution (2560 x 1440 pixels) combined with anti-glare coating delivers great, sharp images. The display also offers a wide color palette, covering 90% NTSC and 107% sRGB color space and a first-class brightness of 350 threads. It is equipped with two HDMI and one DisplayPort port, making it easy to connect to a wide variety of devices.
The new AOC Q27T1 monitor is available from November 2019 at a suggested retail price of € 329.
More information and technical specifications:

https://eu.aoc.com/en/monitors/q27t1


https://www.pchand.si/combination-exciting-design-and-first-technology-monitor-aoc-q27t1




Links: Aoc, Pchand
